entry.title: WEBGL_lose_context : revision 11
entry.summary: Indicated that this extension is not disconnected from the WebGLRenderingContext when that object loses its drawing buffer (i.e. when it performs the steps outlined in "The Context Lost Event" of the WebGL specification).

entry.title: WEBGL_compressed_texture_s3tc : revision 4
entry.summary: Clarified that length of ArrayBufferView is actually byteLength.

entry.title: WEBGL_compressed_texture_atc : revision 2
entry.summary: Clarified that length of ArrayBufferView is actually byteLength.

entry.title: WEBGL_compressed_texture_pvrtc : revision 2
entry.summary: Clarified that length of ArrayBufferView is actually byteLength.

entry.title: WEBGL_lose_context : revision 10
entry.summary: Clarified error generation that conflicted with WebGL spec.

entry.title: WEBGL_lose_context : revision 9
entry.summary: Ratified by Khronos Board of Promoters.

entry.summary: Ratified by Khronos Board of Promoters.
